subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Wright homered to tie it and Daniel Murphy followed with an R.B.I. single in the eighth inning to propel the Mets to a victory over the Yankees in the Subway Series opener.
snippet: David Wright homered to tie it and Daniel Murphy followed with an R.B.I. single in the eighth inning to propel the Mets to a victory over the Yankees in the Subway Series opener.
